Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Peter and St. Paul, and for the Feast of the Apostles:

Text.Language: Hiten nieu,/ n~te na[oic n~io] n~a~poctoloc peniwt Petroc nem pencaq Pauloc P[oic a~rih~mot nan m~pi,w e~bol n~te nennobi.
Through the prayers of my lords and fathers the apostles, our father Peter and our teacher Paul; O Lord, grant us the forgiveness of our sins.
